roleset.name: not of/for the people
roleset.note: UNDEMOCRATIC-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, democratic.01. (from undemocratic.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Of course this is not how we work , but then you ca n't start saying we 're undemocratic because people do n't turn out for the vote , that is their problem , not the government s .
